Amidst [[Númenor]]'s shifting currents, [[Elendil]] searches for hope.|Official Synopsis, [[Amazon Studios]]}} '''Halls of Stone''' is the thirteenth episode of [[Amazon Studios]]'s television series, ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power]]''. It is the fifth episode of the second season and it was released on [[12 September|September 12]], [[2024]]. ==Synopsis== == Cast == === Credited === :''In order of appearance'' (in episode credits) {| class="wikitable" |- bgcolor="#CCCCCC" !
